name: Cat-N-Polts
description:
Cat-N-Polts is a 2d platformer where you survive the gauntlet set before you in a haunted mansion!

Theme: Catapults

Controls:

Arrows Keys to move left and right.

Up Arrow Key to jump.

Move towards wall to wallslide.

While wallsliding, push the up arrow key to wall jump.

Credits:

Tyler Rankin - Programmer

Matt - Character Artist

Brent Richard - Environmental Artist/Composer/Sound Designer

Kuza - Game Designer.
